name: Grilled Shrimp and Chicken Pasta
author: Joyce
summary: A wonderful creamy pasta in a delicious wine sauce, loaded with grilled shrimp and chicken. This recipe is similar to that of a famous steakhouse which shall remain anonymous! Don't be a 'chicken' - try it!
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: In a small bowl, mix together the poultry seasoning, cayenne pepper, white pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder
In a small skillet, melt butter over low heat
Slowly stir in cream and milk, and 1/2 of spice mixture
Continue cooking over low heat, stirring frequently, until slightly reduced and thickened to desired sauce consistency
Remove from heat, and set aside
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat
Carefully stir in wine and remaining spice mixture
Place chicken breasts in the skillet, and cook for 16 to 20 minutes, or until no longer pink in center and juices run clear
Remove from heat and set aside
Cook shrimp on preheated grill for 3 to 4 minutes, or until slightly opaque
Serve each chicken breast on a bed of linguine topped with grilled shrimp
Garnish with Romano cheese, if desired
